#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define rep(i,j,k) for(i=j;i<k;i++)
#define MOD 1000000007

int ans[5001][5001],s[5001][5001];


/* s[i][j]= no of strings with length i and j
	ans[i][j]=length at most i and j
*/	
int main()
{
	
	int t,n,i,j;
	long long tt;
	
	s[1][1]=ans[1][1]=26;
	

	
	
	rep(i,1,5001)
		rep(j,1,5001){
		if(i==1 and j==1)
			continue;
		
		tt=(long long)ans[i-1][j-1]*25;
		tt%=MOD;
		s[i][j]=((int)tt+26)%MOD;

		ans[i][j]=s[i][j];
		ans[i][j]%=MOD;
		ans[i][j]+=ans[i-1][j];
		ans[i][j]%=MOD;
		ans[i][j]+=ans[i][j-1];
		ans[i][j]%=MOD;
		ans[i][j]-=ans[i-1][j-1];
		if(ans[i][j]<0)
			ans[i][j]+=MOD;		
			}
			
	scanf("%d",&t);	
	
	do{
	
		scanf("%d",&n);
			printf("%d\n",ans[n][n]);
	
	}while(--t);
	
	return 0;
}
